HDG.BC.content: relinquishing thought most deplorable way for thought to accomplish task [re: refusing to rely on “paradox”]: give up question of Being as pseudoquestion, or acknowledge exposed impasse (“aporia”) (must come to terms w/ it in some way) [how to treat Derrida’s aporia?] > impasse that Being brings w/ it is its mark of distinction (eigene Auszeichnung)[mark prior to Being? differance] > acc. Heidegger, to call impasse (Ausweglosigkeit) “aporia” is to close eyes at impasse [?] [Heidegger beyond Derrida?]

HDG.WL.content: attend (Achten) to language exclusively as language, follow language’s demands, focus our eyes on that which gathers, grants (gewährt), proper unity of essence of language

HDG.EC.content: [can’t pass judgment on ontology of world-event] devastation comes forth from being, is a world-event (Weltereignis) that beleaguers (umlagert) the earth > person who passes judgment falls prey to quarreling/annoyance that gnaw at him, he becomes slave to self-righteousness (Selbstgerechtigkeit) [Nietzsche on revenge dimming one’s own eyes]

HDG.OHF.content: questions grow out of confrontation (Auseinandersetzung) w/ “subject matter (Sachen)” > subject matter there (da) only where eyes are

HDG.OHF.content: expressive network of reference to different cultural systems demands possibility of holding onto them in a unified manner (einer einheitlichen Behaltbarkeit) > thus, investigations are actualizing (vollzieht) themselves out of a foresight re: and of a having-in-view of styles (Vorsicht auf- und einem Im-Blick-haben des Stils) > w/in this point of view (Hinblick) the modes of expressive being are actualized > the anticipatory having-present of the cultural object, running in advance of all research, made explicit in its actualization: das Vorweghaben der Stileinheitlichkeit (the anticipatory forehaving or path-having in advance of unity of style) proves/guards (bewährt) its adequacy to subject matter while explaining itself (its basic characteristics still hidden) [self-fulfilling w/out an eye to destruction]
